name: AGON - The Mysterious Codex (Trilogy)
description: Professor Hunt embarks on an adventure journey from London to Lapland and Madagascar, in search of mysterious ancient board games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/2000/XP/7/8/10 Processor: 800MHz Pentium 3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 32MB 3D Video Card DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 850 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card

reviews.review_text: Old game ? not good graphics? just click to play ? looking soo easy ?  its the game that will give you a very tough time ,and you will hit your head to solve a puzzle ,u may get a crack on head but still cant solve the puzzles.. am amazed how they made such a wonderful piece long back... specially board games are mindbubbling... you will remember those puzzles for soo many days...
